stories.text: Honestly I am trying to follow the instructions for giving funds to the army here https://armysos.com.ua/en/help-the-army  But for an American the instructions are not clear. We are not used to giving direct to bank accounts and instead typically rely on credit card. Can someone help me figure out how to do this? Western Union didn't seem to work for me

stories.text: Western countries agreed to supply Ukraine with new weapons and ban Russia from SWIFT payments. Russia might respond to Western countries with cyberattacks. Many businesses and institutions are probably unprepared and vulnerable. What can be done quickly to protect hardware and data when you are not technically savvy?
